question: I had my nikaah recently, but rukhsati (Bidaai) of my wife from her parents house is left behind.Can we both live together and also go for HumBistari(Love making) as per islamic rules.
answer:
QUESTION
My wife is coming to the place where i work, for her studies.Can we both live together and get intimate to the limits of love making .I hope we wont be doing anything wrong.Pls let me know.
ANSWER


Share:
Once with Nikah has taken place, your wife is permissible for you. It is not
prohibited to be intimate with her.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
